examples: —You wanna get pizza for dinner? — Yeah , all right.

definitions.definition: Used to express acknowledgment of what was previously said.
examples: —You wanna get pizza for dinner? — Yeah , I think I'm gonna have leftovers instead.

definitions.definition: Used to ascertain the continued attention of the listener.
examples: I was walking down the road, yeah , and you know what I saw, yeah ? A dog wearing a dress!

secondary_definitions: Used to express acknowledgment of what was previously said.
Used to ascertain the continued attention of the listener.
